text_block_list.text: Today is finally the debut race. Due to her high reputation, Air Groove was 1st in popularity.
But一

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: The first horse girl has entered the final straight! The fan favorite Air Groove is sharply blasting through!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Will she make it?! Will she make it!? The goal is right in front of her eyes! Will Air Groove make it?!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Goal!!! "The Empress" Air Groove comes in an undeniable 2nd!
"Full speed"…the exhausted horse girl embodied that phrase perfectly, and it tore Air Groove apart…

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Defeat… damn it! How pathetic…!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: …No. This isn't the time to get angry, or to feel regret. I was lacking as "The Empress", and so I got the deserved outcome.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: If that's the case, I need to keep going until I'm sufficient…!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Hey you, as the horse girl you're supervising I'm suggesting a change of plans. Today was supposed to be a rest day but I want to hold a meeting.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: We're going to completely revise the training menu, and aim for even greater heights…!!
Killing her humiliation, she's already looking forward. Air Groove is always working her hardest to reach her ideal "Empress".
Which is why as her trainer I want to be even more helpful, for example clearing at least some of her busy schedule一

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Hey, are you listening? What are you daydreaming about?

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: …Don't tell me, I hope you're not thinking of involving yourself in my business too.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: It was the first thing I told you, wasn't it? You'll concern yourself with only my training. I won't allow you input on anything other than that.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Or do you intend to violate the contract?
…I'm worried about Air Groove's busy schedule, but it seems like the contract will be terminated if I don't watch my mouth.
So what should I do? That day, after returning to my room I thought about it endlessly一

text_block_list.name: Air Groove's Trainer
text_block_list.text: But, if she continues in her student council activities and guiding her juniors, it's her own growth that'll be affected! So一

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Air Groove takes part in those with a clear will and purpose. No one should be able to deprive her of that without her consent.
In the first place, why does Air Groove commit so much to the student council at the expense of her own time?
First, I have to learn the reason why…!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: I see. So that's why you came to see me. Hm…

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: I could explain it to you myself. But that wouldn't be enough for you to understand her ambitions.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: If you wish to stand from the same viewpoint as her. Shouldn't you see it with your own eyes?

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: But, you came here to see me after thinking hard about her. That sincerity was well communicated.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Out of respect and sincerity to you, I'll guide you. Follow me.
Led by Symboli Rudolf, I found Air Groove guiding Mejiro Dober at the end of the course.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Your acceleration after your start is still a bit lacking. Raise your pitch and widen your strides.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: My strides…? But, whenever I'm conscious of widening them, my speed keeps lowering…

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: It's probably because your body isn't used to the rhythm required for long strides yet. Alright, let me give you a good training tip.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Mark the course at an interval of about 1.5m, step on it accurately and try to run without slowing down as much as possible.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Once you're used to it try 1.8m, 2m… and then just keep going from there. Once you do it like that your body will naturally adapt to the rhythm.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: I see…! Thank you very much, I'll give it a try…!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: …Mejiro Dober is uncomfortable around men. It seems she had trouble being guided by a male instructor.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: At that time, the person who noticed first and reached out their hand to help was Air Groove.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: The reason Mejiro Dober is still learning freely at this school, is probably in large thanks to Air Groove.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: And一

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: So this is where you were, Suzuka. What were you doing?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Eh? Um… nothing really.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: It looks like we can't use the training course right now due to poor maintenance so… When I can't run, I don't really have anything to do…

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: And so you're lazing around here now? Hm… how like you.

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: Well then, good news for you. The student council has dealt with the poor maintenance of the course. Some are already available.

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Ah! Really?!

text_block_list.name: Air Groove
text_block_list.text: The curfew is soon, but it's you. If you can run for 10 or 20 minutes, you'll still want to won't you?

text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
text_block_list.text: Yes! Thank you, Air Groove!

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Even when Silence Suzuka was in a tough spot, Air Groove still managed to help her.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: And as the vice president of the student council, she's been working hard to make the school a better environment.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Her efforts have helped the entire school… And of course to me the president, she's an invaluable right hand.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Now then… how was it? Was today's experience able to bring you closer to an answer?
choice_data_list: I'm going to think it over one more time

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: I see. Not rushing to a conclusion is a wonderful attitude. Hm一

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: She was stressing over doing things without support, but it seems that will end in melancholy.

text_block_list.name: Symboli Rudolf
text_block_list.text: Nothing. It's an uphill battle… I wish you good luck.
I've steeled myself… let's think over on Air Groove one more time.
